speak;Vanessa;Did you see that?|The way Joshua held his utensils?

speak;Vanessa;Joshua, no ordinary mercenary eats with such...refinement.
speak;Joshua;Eh...do they?|A man can't enjoy his meal with proper manners?
speak;Tana;And yesterday, I saw you reading that tome on past wars.|You were analyzing the battle tactics, weren't you?|Like a regular scholar...

speak;Joshua;Oho...you are a princess, aren't you?|So you're an expert on royalty, then.|And you, Vanessa?
speak;Vanessa;I've served in the royal court my entire life.|There's no noble of the land I haven't seen, and you...|You act more than a bit like them.
speak;Joshua;Ah...just my luck...|Well then, I suppose you think I'm more than I apprear?|Care to wager on my true identity, then?
speak;Tana;Hah!|I know it!|But what noble family could you be from?
speak;Joshua;Hah!|You'd like to know, wouldn't you?|But if you were willing to bet on it...
speak;Vanessa;Stop deflecting, Joshua.|The way you carry yourself, your knowledge of politics...
speak;Joshua;My mother taught me well, that's all.
speak;Tana;Your mother, huh?|Hmmmm...Now that you say that you do look like...
expression;Joshua;CloseEyes
speak;Joshua;Ah, my mistake.
expression;Joshua;NormalBlink
speak;Joshua;Would you look at the time?

speak;Joshua;Again, wouldn't you like to know?|The truth's boring, really.|However knowledge is power, especially at the gambling table.
speak;Tana;Wait...what's that on your coat?|That crest, I just noticed it!
speak;Joshua;Huh|This old thing?|Won it in a card game.|Thought it'd look nice, and it does!
speak;Tana;Look nice, my foot!|It's a crest of royalty, and you know it!|I just need to figure out which...
speak;Vanessa;We've got you cornered now.|Admit it!
speak;Joshua;Ladies, it's been delightful...|But I never gamble when the odds aren't in my favor.|...or perhaps...
